overview: Mark Hemmert joined Psytechnics in November 2007. He is responsible for growing revenue in North and South America through the direct sales organization and partners. Mark served previously as Director of Voice Management Solutions at Computer Associates, where he grew a niche VoIP management offering into a global, top-tier focus for the company. Mark has a successful history over 20 years in telecommunications technology and software, and has built strategic partnerships with Cisco, Nortel, Avaya and Microsoft for many companies. Mark has held executive posts with young, fast-track players such as Vitel Software, eDial, and Outreach Technology as well as established technology providers, Fujitsu Ltd., Concord Communications and RCA.

relationships.title: VP of Sales and Operations - The Americas
